summary: This document appears to be a correspondence regarding the transfer of assets between financial entities, specifically involving Pershing LLC and Southern Financial, LLC. It includes details about various financial instruments and the need for wire instructions for currency transfer.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is mentioned as an associate in Wealth Investment Coverage at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc, involved in the asset transfer process.

connections.description: Vahe Stepanian and Janet Young are both associated with Deutsche Bank, indicating a professional relationship.
Janet Young sent an email to Amanda Kebyldbrdbcorn regarding the asset transfer.
Amanda Kebyldbrdbcorn forwarded the email to Lisa D Hurd, indicating a communication link.

events.title: Asset Transfer Notification
events.description: An email was sent summarizing the assets to be transferred to Pershing LLC, including details about the financial instruments involved.

keyFacts: The document discusses the transfer of assets totaling 2,000,000 from Southern Financial, LLC to Pershing LLC.
Vahe Stepanian is identified as an associate at Deutsche Bank involved in the asset transfer.
The email includes a request for EURO wire instructions for currency transfer.
Several financial instruments are mentioned, including PETROLEOS DE VENEZUELA and various JPM Southern Financial assets.
The document is marked as confidential pursuant to federal rules.
